description: Stera The Art Of Jewelry designs and crafts top quality Sterling Silver jewelry at affordable prices. All of the jewelry pieces are handmade by our remarkable staff in our design studio. Our eclectic jewelry pieces combine classic and contemporary designs, nature motifs and inspirations from eastern and western cultures. The exquisite jewelry pieces, many with colorful gemstones, are uniquely designed producing a jewelry line that is both fashionable and original. Every jewelry piece is created with great care, exceptional attention to detail and strict quality control. The jewelry pieces arrive packed in a lovely gift box. We provide high quality with personal and professional service to each buyer.

925 Sterling Silver necklace for girls with three original Swarovski crystal butterfly stations. Please select your color choice above. 925 Sterling Silver chain with original Swarovski butterfly shaped crystals. This exquisite necklace comes with three 8 mm original Swarovski butterfly crystal stations. Each of the crystal butterflies measures about 0.8 cm or 5/16" in size. Artisan handmade.
This sparkling necklace is a wonderful gift for girls on any occasion, birthday, Christmas and Easter.
The nickel free 925 Sterling Silver chain measures about 40 cm or 16" in length and comes with a standard 925 Silver 10 cm or 4" extension chain for an adjustable length up to 50 cm or 20".
